TextBlock.Text: ARVI: I have an idea involving <color=orange>Helioraxia</color>.
BUXUS: What is it? Something to do with its gravity?
ARVI: Uh, yeah, somewhat. I was thinking we use the data from the <color=orange>Metallos base</color> in order to advance further.
ARVI: Though I do mourn over <color=green>his</color> death.
BUXUS: We all do, Arvi. So, what's this idea of yours?
ARVI: Well, it involves building a base <color=orange>right on the core</color>.
